summary: A simple mod that makes you feel the effects of drinking
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that makes you feel the effects of drinking,
Effects:
Blur
Distortion
Stumbling

*IMPORTANT*
I did not make this mod:
Most of the credit goes to jerno2000(Jeremy Burkhart) because his mod was the base for this I only made a few changes like added support for DLC drinks.

So enjoy and thanks to jerno2000(Jeremy Burkhart)
author: Jeremy Burkhart - AwkwardGuy
